elements.text: Your family is planning a big vacation in a few years. You wonder what life will look like for you by then and whether the vacation will be possible. No matter what the future holds, you will still be able to enjoy time with your family outside of traveling, and your family will be...

elements.name: Planning a Family Vacation_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
